title: I3S Point Cloud layer: obb
description: Oriented bounding boxes organize nodes in a hierarchical tree.

center.description: The center point of the oriented bounding box. For a global scene, i.e. XY coordinate system in WGS1984, center is in longitude of decimal degrees, latitude of decimal degrees, elevation in meters.

halfSize.description: Half size of the oriented bounding box measured in meter.

orientation.description: Orientation of the oriented bounding box. Measured in ECEF Cartesian space. ( Z+ : North, Y+ : East, X+: lon=lat=0.0).
